title: Tom Fornelli and Joe Fortenbaugh on fantasy sleepers, best bets for 2018 (Football 07/30)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports' Tom Fornelli and Joe Fortenbaugh of 95.7 the Game to break down some potential picks for fantasy breakouts/sleepers in 2018 as well as to look at some of the best bets available to gamblers out there for the 2018 season.
